{"name": "NF.TD p$ Fabric 1", "description": "For both campaign creators and contributors, Fabric will now display a checkmark on profiles that have verified links on NFTD - making it easier to see who you are and learn more about the things youb�re working on.

Youb�ll also now be able to add your verified Fabric campaign (via wallet proof) to your NFTD profiles. Fabric campaigns that are ongoing will flash with a live indicator, and the currently funded amount will be dynamically displayed in the link.

It was important for us to integrate identity verification infrastructure that was transparent, crypto-native, and non-intrusive.

Much more to come from both Fabric & NFTD in making it easier to create and collaborate with others.
